statements: DELETE FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE room_name = 'Living Room' AND time_start > '08:00:00'
DELETE FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE user_id = 123 AND room_name = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE time_start < '08:00' AND light_intensity > 50;
DELETE FROM schedule WHERE user_id = 123 AND start_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 456 AND preferred_light_id IN (1, 2);
DELETE FROM light_groups WHERE group_name = 'Living Room Lights';
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1 AND light_id = 2;
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 3 AND control_id = 2;
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE control_id = 3 AND status_preference = 'active';
